An Argentinian judge has ruled that eight medical personnel involved in the care of soccer star Diego Maradona will face a public trial for criminal negligence.

articles.author: Charlotte Daly
articles.title: Deontay Wilder backs Oleksandr Usyk to beat Anthony Joshua in their rematch - Daily Mail
articles.description: Deontay Wilder has  backed Ukrainian boxer Oleksandr Usyk to beat Anthony Joshua in their rematch at the Jeddah Super Dome on August 20. While Tyson Fury agrees Usyk is too 'smart' for AJ.
articles.content:
Deontay Wilder has backed Oleksandr Usyk to beat Anthony Joshua in their rematch at the Jeddah Super Dome on August 20.
